title: The Monster Duchess and Contract Princess - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Adopted Protagonist   Child Abuse   Complex Family Relationships   Cute Protagonist   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Familial Love   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hidden Abilities   Magic   Manipulative Characters   Nobles   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Revenge   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Sword And Magic   Tragic Past
author: 리아란
description:
As long as she could be loved, she wouldn’t mind being starved or beaten. However, when she was thrown to the fire as a sacrifice for her sister, her hopes were shattered. 

“Adopt me.” 

Leslie, who barely survived in the fire, went to the Duchess, who was looking for a little child to adopt as her daughter. 

“No, because I know you’re the best dark magic user in the empire.”

 “Leslie, come this way.” 

“No, yesterday you ate with first brother, so today you should eat with second brother.” 

“Leslie, I have your favorite jelly here.”

 My brothers make a contest every morning, asking me to sit next to them. Hey, what is this relationship?>
